text:
These companies may use information obtained through their cookies (which may include your name, address, email address or telephone number) about your visits to our and other web sites, in combination with Personal Data or Non Personal data about your purchases and interests from other online sites in order to provide advertisements about goods and services of interest to you.
We may also use third-party advertising companies to serve ads while you are visiting our Site and permit these companies to place and access their own cookies on your computer in the course of serving advertisements on our Site.

The following describes the privacy policy of ChipBrain, Inc. ("ChipBrain") (as amended or otherwise modified and in effect from time to time, the "Privacy Policy") applicable to the services available through the ChipBrain web site, our mobile applications and other interfaces (collectively, the "Site") from ChipBrain.

For example, ChipBrain hires companies to help us handle mail and email (including sending and delivering packages, postal mail and email), analyze the data we collect, market our products and services, handle credit card transactions and provide customer service.

The following describes the privacy policy of ChipBrain, Inc. ("ChipBrain") (as amended or otherwise modified and in effect from time to time, the "Privacy Policy") applicable to the services available through the ChipBrain web site, our mobile applications and other interfaces (collectively, the "Site") from ChipBrain.
If you purchase certain services for others, we will collect the names of the others as provided by you.

data_type: web site usage information about visitor to site
text: In addition, we may share web site usage information about visitors to our Site with these companies for the purpose of managing and targeting advertisements and for market research analysis on our Site and other sites.
